name.description: Name that identifies this Client center.

displayName.description: Display Name that identifies this Client center.

description.description: Description of the Client center instance.

reviewers.description: User references of the reviewers for this Client center.

mutuallyExclusive.description: Client center clients that are direct children in this Client center are mutually exclusive. When mutually exclusive is `true` only one client can be used to label an entity. When mutually exclusive is `false`, multiple clients from this group can be used to label an entity.

domain.description: Fully qualified name of the domain the Client center belongs to.

extension.description: Entity extension data with custom attributes added to the entity.
